org.corfudb.universe.scenario.action

Interface Action<R>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Action.AbstractAction
    Functional Interface:
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.

    @FunctionalInterface
public interface Action<R>
    Provides an interface for executable actions used in scenarios. Action represents some business logic, an action provides some result. Actions can be reused in different test scenarios.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  Action.AbstractAction<R>
      Actions do some work and often it changes Universe state, in most cases an action needs to have a Universe as a dependency.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      R execute()
      Execute an action.

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        R execute()
        Execute an action.
        Returns:
        action result
